description:
From their first toboggan run to backyard snow architecture, if your little one is enjoying the snow, this suit will keep them cozy and dry. Wheat has made the Ludo winter suit for all winters, whether your snow is wet and heavy or light and powdery. A recycled waterproof breathable shell keeps precipitation right where it should be. While recycled synthetic insulation wraps them in quilt-like warmth. When the sun come out, kids can shrug out of the top portion and internal suspenders will keep the suit in place, so the fun doesn’t need to stop for a wardrobe change.

  • Recycled polyester shell has a waterproof polyurethane coating
  • Recycled polyester insulation holds onto warm air, is light and packable, and even stay warm when wet
  • Soft quilted liner feels great and wicks away moisture
  • BIONIC-FINISH®ECO fluorocarbon-free water and dirt repellent finish helps keep kids clean and dry
  • Full seam sealed construction adds even more weather protection
  • Removable insulated hood is there in lieu of a toque, or to add to a toques warmth
  • Waterproof YKK zipper with a storm flap
  • Sleeves have thumb holes and cuffs have stirrups (removable), so the suit won’t ride up when their on the move
  • Internal elasticised suspenders
  • Snap-closed hand pockets keeps must-haves close
  • Internal name label takes some confusion out of the coat room
  • Wheat rates the Ludo to -25°C
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Wheat Wintersuit Ludo - Children
